Blog.post: as the "game" is been played on..( only janice and i know what game is that) i dunno how to settle it... should i say out what i feel or keep it.. i know it is selfish.. but it is really nice to been cared and pampered by someone... really it is... i know it might be a lame excuse.. but i dun have my kor's care and dun have his concern now.. so i really dun mind having an online friend to care and concern.. to make sure that i do my things... to be there for me.. what should i do now?

feeling so cold now... even without the fan... still got sore throat.. and today my day is so so so bored.. to add on.. the worse part is that i went to his friendster account.. make me miss the days again.. what only....

i might not be just as strong as wad i am this afternoon.. i am not.. one biggest point is that this afternoon i was not left alone.. this afternoon i did not feel anything coz my friendz were with me.. but now.. looking at the com. i dunno... just feel a bit weird weird and once again.. the subject that is suffering is my F&n.. coz i have no mood to settle it... yupz.. just dun even feel like doing anything,... sigh.. desperate need a kor.. a jie might be good too... yupz...

after almost one whole day, i still have no feel anything... yup.. maybe two reasons available.. up to now.. i still am not being left alone... talking to my friend on the phone and that till now.. i just come back.. or another reason.. no feeling liaoz... dunno which is which... but anyway... even if i cry or do anything harmful to myself.. what is the use... he already have gf liaoz. and that i think till now i believe.. what is mine is mine.. what is not mine will never be mine... yupz... so... haiya. who cares.. worse is that i go and find another kor or jie lorz... or worse.. put as my msn nick, desperate for kor and jie... who wants? haha....

he told me that he got a gf and its confirm already... it has been two weeks already and who cares.. just hope that my friendz dun leave me alone in sch.. or my imagination will run wild.. also nice that i got separated quite q while so feelings are not that strong...wadever the case is... it should be time.. yup.. it is time....

i dun feel anything when he told me he got gf.. dun even know if it is true or not.. just that very curious to know... and that.. hmm...maybe becoz now i am busy with things ba? wait tioll i am left alone till i might cry.. but anyway.. he is my ah gong and will always be... dun care.. worse is that i will just stop smsing him.. that is all...

ppl got kor to care for them... sze rui got jason to care for her as a kor, but for me.. just a request.. where is my kor and ah gong... think that even if they are here... the feeling is no longer as strong as the past..the bond is no longer there... jacky.. sigh... he is so busy with everything.. talk to him also lack of topic... chye eng.. nowhere to be found.. and now.. i am really longing for last yr... sigh.... where everything is so nice... forget it... wait for them can really wait till i even graduate and they will not appear.. so wad if they appear.. will they be able to motivate me? sigh....

today, mdm siti finally return me the f&n coursework that she has lend to Rajen... and really... i really have to say taht i dun have the mood to settl;e part B.. i really dun... then when she return me back my coursework and ask me to write the page no, i really could not help but feel like crying.. in teh end, after the period, i cried... really did...

yesterday i chat with jazz again( and i know that this will make lots of ppl scream at me, especially jacky and janice).. then i really dunno.. he sounded so nice... he said that he miss me and everything. but i really dunno.. what actually happen? just coz of a few sentence and that i begin to feel a different way about him?

today i woke up at 5.30am.. can u believe it.. it is on a sunday lorz.. a sunday.. means what.. offical rest day for us students u know...got to wake up so early.. met joy, maziah and suting at bedok where we had mcdonalds for breakfast.. haha... then later../ bishan park to the x country... hmm... ok lar.. just that find that it is a bit jia lat lorz.. weather so hot,.. anyway... later went to jurong point.. yup yup.. where we brought mas present... then now... gonna wedding dinner.. byez!

for once, i really envy my friendz, coz they are so happy lorz.. and so lucky.. like sze rui, she got a "kor" who is so concern about her.. but for me, god knows where is my kor lorz... then i also envy those who got stead lorz... got ppl to love them.. sigh.. for once, really envy them...
haha... one testimonial for me from... haha... not bad ba?

got my chi o level results today and i was fine in class.. till the time i came back home.. then i had started crying,.... crying hard... i was just a few marks away... away from no need to retake chi level... jacky and kor got the same band as me.. but last yr.. when jacky got his results.. he was so happy.. but me... sigh... anyway.. i had told my kor that i will not cry ... no matter wad .. but sad to say.. i did... i dun want to do anything now... suddenly just dun have the attitude to do f&n... how i wish... truly wish.. kor or jacky is really here.. coz i know for sure.. they can take away the troubles and "postpone" the troubles till another time...

really losing my voice soon.. and i am not surprised that i will be fainting soon.... i really dunno.... huh.... nice? huh? brother's friendz all coming to my house? oh dead... i can really stop dreaming of all the peace... 5 of them some more... help me... save me... and crazy.. of all the days to choose.. choose tml.... help? and there are more ppl coming!!!!! help!!!

nothin much happened these few days ... only that i am still having sore throat and that life is now a bit.. scary?coz there is always the countdown being written on the whiteboard... 39 days to prelim... hmm.... but still not studying as usual... jia lat.. but who cares... wait till mood first lorz...
